verses.verse: Then Solomon<WH8010> said,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> has said<WH559> that he would dwell<WH7931> in the thick darkness.<WH6205>
But I have built<WH1129> you a house<WH1004> of habitation,<WH2073> and a place<WH4349> for you to dwell<WH3427> in forever.<WH5769>"
The king<WH4428> turned<WH5437> his face,<WH6440> and blessed<WH1288> all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel:<WH3478> and all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478> stood.<WH5975>

He said,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> who spoke<WH1696> with his mouth<WH6310> to David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> and has with his hands<WH3027> fulfilled<WH4390> it,<WH559> saying,

<WH3117> 'Since the day that I brought forth<WH3318> my people<WH5971> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> I chose<WH977> no city<WH5892> out of all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> in,<WH8034> that my name might be there;<WH977> neither chose I any man<WH376> to be prince<WH5057> over my people<WH5971> Israel:<WH3478>
but I have chosen<WH977> Jerusalem,<WH3389> that my name<WH8034> might be there;<WH977> and have chosen David<WH1732> to be over my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>'
Now it was in the heart<WH3824> of David<WH1732> my father<WH1> to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

But Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> <WH3824> 'Whereas it was in your heart to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for my name,<WH8034> you did well<WH2895> that it was in your heart:<WH3824>

nevertheless<WH7535> you shall not build<WH1129> the house;<WH1004> but your son<WH1121> who shall come forth<WH3318> out of your body,<WH2504> he shall build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> for my name.<WH8034>'

"Yahweh<WH3068> has performed<WH6965> his word<WH1697> that he spoke;<WH1696> for I have risen up<WH6965> in the place of David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> and sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of Israel,<WH3478> as Yahweh<WH3068> promised,<WH1696> and have built<WH1129> the house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>
There<WH8033> I have set<WH7760> the ark,<WH727> in which is the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he made<WH3772> with the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"
He stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh<WH3068> in the presence of all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel,<WH3478> and spread forth<WH6566> his hands<WH3709>

(for Solomon<WH8010> had made<WH6213> a bronze<WH5178> scaffold,<WH3595> five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> broad,<WH7341> and three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> high,<WH6967> and had set<WH5414> it in the midst<WH8432> of the court;<WH5835> and on it he stood,<WH5975> and kneeled down<WH1288> on his knees<WH1290> before all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel,<WH3478> and spread forth<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> toward heaven;<WH8064>)

and he said,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> there is no God<WH430> like you,<WH8064> in heaven, or on earth;<WH776> you who keep<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and loving kindness<WH2617> with your servants,<WH5650> who walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> you with all their heart;<WH3820>

who have kept<WH8104> with your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> my father<WH1> that which you promised<WH1696> him:<WH1696> yes, you spoke with your mouth,<WH6310> and have fulfilled<WH4390> it with your hand,<WH3027> as it is this day.<WH3117>

"Now therefore,<WH3068> Yahweh, the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> keep<WH8104> with your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> my father<WH1> that which you have promised<WH1696> him,<WH559> saying, <WH3772> 'There shall not fail you a man<WH376> in my sight<WH6440> to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of Israel,<WH3478> if only<WH7535> your children<WH1121> take heed<WH8104> to their way,<WH1870> to walk<WH3212> in my law<WH8451> as you have walked<WH3212> before me.<WH6440>'
Now therefore,<WH3068> Yahweh, the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> let your word<WH1697> be verified,<WH539> which you spoke<WH1696> to your servant<WH5650> David.<WH1732>

"But will God<WH430> indeed<WH552> dwell<WH3427> with men<WH120> on the earth?<WH776> Behold,<WH8064> heaven and the heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064> can't<WH3557> contain you;<WH1004> how much less this house which I have built!<WH1129>

Yet have respect<WH6437> for the prayer<WH8605> of your servant,<WH5650> and to his supplication,<WH8467> Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> to listen<WH8085> to the cry<WH7440> and to the prayer<WH8605> which your servant<WH5650> prays<WH6419> before you;<WH6440>

that your eyes<WH5869> may be open<WH6605> toward this house<WH1004> day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> even toward the place<WH4725> where you have said<WH559> that you would put<WH7760> your name;<WH8034> to listen<WH8085> to the prayer<WH8605> which your servant<WH5650> shall pray<WH6419> toward this place.<WH4725>

Listen<WH8085> to the petitions<WH8469> of your servant,<WH5650> and of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when they shall pray<WH6419> toward this place:<WH4725> yes,<WH8085> hear from your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4725> even from heaven;<WH8064> and when you hear,<WH8085> forgive.<WH5545>

"If a man<WH376> sin<WH2398> against his neighbor,<WH7453> and an oath<WH423> is laid<WH5375> on him to cause him to swear,<WH422> and he comes<WH935> and swears<WH422> before<WH6440> your altar<WH4196> in this house;<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> and do,<WH6213> and judge<WH8199> your servants,<WH5650> bringing retribution<WH7725> to the wicked,<WH7563> to bring<WH5414> his way<WH1870> on his own head;<WH7218> and justifying<WH6663> the righteous,<WH6662> to give<WH5414> him according to his righteousness.<WH6666>

"If your people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> be struck<WH5062> down before<WH6440> the enemy,<WH341> because they have sinned<WH2398> against you,<WH7725> and shall turn again and confess<WH3034> your name,<WH8034> and pray<WH6419> and make supplication<WH2603> before<WH6440> you in this house;<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> and forgive<WH5545> the sin<WH2403> of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and bring them again<WH7725> to the land<WH127> which you gave<WH5414> to them and to their fathers.<WH1>

"When the sky<WH8064> is shut up,<WH6113> and there is no rain,<WH4306> because they have sinned<WH2398> against you;<WH6419> if they pray toward this place,<WH4725> and confess<WH3034> your name,<WH8034> and turn<WH7725> from their sin,<WH2403> when you afflict them:<WH6031>

then hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> and forgive<WH5545> the sin<WH2403> of your servants,<WH5650> and of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when you teach<WH3384> them the good<WH2896> way<WH1870> in which they should walk;<WH3212> and send<WH5414> rain<WH4306> on your land,<WH776> which you have given<WH5414> to your people<WH5971> for an inheritance.<WH5159>

"If there is famine<WH7458> in the land,<WH776> if there is pestilence,<WH1698> if there is blight<WH7711> or mildew,<WH3420> locust<WH697> or caterpillar;<WH2625> if their enemies<WH341> besiege<WH6887> them in the land<WH776> of their cities;<WH8179> whatever plague<WH5061> or whatever sickness there is;<WH4245>

whatever prayer<WH8605> and supplication<WH8467> be made by any man,<WH120> or by all your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> who shall know<WH3045> every man<WH376> his own plague<WH5061> and his own sorrow,<WH4341> and shall spread forth<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> toward this house:<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> your dwelling<WH3427> place<WH4349> and forgive,<WH5545> and render<WH5414> to every man<WH376> according to all his ways,<WH1870> whose heart<WH3824> you know;<WH3045> (for you,<WH3045> even you only, know the hearts<WH3824> of the children<WH1121> of men;<WH120>)
that they may fear<WH3372> you,<WH3212> to walk in your ways,<WH1870> so long as<WH3117> they live<WH2416> in the land<WH127> which you gave<WH5414> to our fathers.<WH1>

"Moreover concerning the foreigner,<WH5237> who is not of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when he shall come<WH935> from a far<WH7350> country<WH776> for your great<WH1419> name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH2389> and your mighty hand,<WH3027> and your outstretched<WH5186> arm;<WH2220> when they shall come<WH935> and pray<WH6419> toward this house:<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> even from your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4349> and do<WH6213> according to all that the foreigner<WH5237> calls<WH7121> to you for;<WH5971> that all the peoples of the earth<WH776> may know<WH3045> your name,<WH8034> and fear<WH3372> you,<WH5971> as does your people Israel,<WH3478> and that they may know<WH3045> that this house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> is called<WH7121> by your name.<WH8034>

"If your people<WH5971> go out<WH3318> to battle<WH4421> against their enemies,<WH341> by whatever way<WH1870> you shall send<WH7971> them,<WH6419> and they pray to you toward<WH1870> this city<WH5892> which you have chosen,<WH977> and the house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> for your name;<WH8034>
then hear<WH8085> from heaven<WH8064> their prayer<WH8605> and their supplication,<WH8467> and maintain<WH6213> their cause.<WH4941>

"If they sin<WH2398> against you<WH120> (for there is no man who doesn't<WH2398> sin), and you are angry<WH599> with them,<WH5414> and deliver them to<WH6440> the enemy,<WH341> so that they carry them away<WH7617> captive<WH7617> to a land<WH776> far off<WH7350> or near;<WH7138>

yet if they shall repent<WH7725> themselves in the land<WH776> where they are carried captive,<WH7617> and turn<WH7725> again,<WH2603> and make supplication to you in the land<WH776> of their captivity,<WH7628> saying,<WH559> <WH2398> 'We have sinned, we have done perversely,<WH7561> and have dealt wickedly;<WH7561>'

if they return<WH7725> to you with all their heart<WH3820> and with all their soul<WH5315> in the land<WH776> of their captivity,<WH7628> where they have carried them captive,<WH7617> and pray<WH6419> toward<WH1870> their land,<WH776> which you gave<WH5414> to their fathers,<WH1> and the city<WH5892> which you have chosen,<WH977> and toward the house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> for your name:<WH8034>

then hear<WH8085> from heaven,<WH8064> even from your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4349> their prayer<WH8605> and their petitions,<WH8467> and maintain<WH6213> their cause,<WH4941> and forgive<WH5545> your people<WH5971> who have sinned against you.<WH2398>
"Now,<WH430> my God, let,<WH5869> I beg you, your eyes be open,<WH6605> and let your ears<WH241> be attentive,<WH7183> to the prayer<WH8605> that is made in this place.<WH4725>

"Now therefore arise,<WH6965> Yahweh<WH3068> God,<WH430> into your resting<WH5118> place,<WH727> you, and the ark of your strength:<WH5797> let your priests,<WH3548> Yahweh<WH3068> God,<WH430> be clothed<WH3847> with salvation,<WH8668> and let your saints<WH2623> rejoice<WH8055> in goodness.<WH2896>
"Yahweh<WH3068> God,<WH430> don't<WH7725> turn away the face<WH6440> of your anointed.<WH4899> Remember<WH2142> your loving kindnesses<WH2617> to David<WH1732> your servant.<WH5650>"
